segments.text: So what did you think about the movie ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I think this Star Wars episode is an excellent piece of work , but not as good as the previous ones .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? I don't agree . This Star Wars episode was incredible !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , one of the most spectacular things about this one was the special effects . State of the art special effects are the main reason for the success of previous episodes , so audiences have high expectations for this one , and I don't think they will be disappointed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are right . The special effects were amazing . And I like the fact that they created so many fantastic settings and otherworldly costumes , weapons and creatures .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's kind of cool that they are still using the same Star Wars theme song for this movie .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah ! It reminds me of the previous Star Wars scenes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know exactly what you mean . Hearing that song gives me a nostalgic feeling .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I thought the overall plot of the movie was very interesting , but I don't think the character development was that strong .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think that they had anything to do with the casting of the movie ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , the casting is great and the actors were excellent . They just didn ’ t have a lot of funny or meaningful dialogues . The writing was also a little weak .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , maybe . But I like the little kid who played Manakin Skywalker . I can't imagine anyone else playing that role .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I liked him too . He is so cute ! You know , even though I was slightly disappointed , I can't wait for the next episode . I wonder when they ’ re going to start making it and when it ’ s scheduled for release ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've no idea . But looking at the success of Star Wars episode , I've a strong feeling production for the next episode will be selling pretty soon . I hope It will be even better than this one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I think we should go now . It's getting pretty late .
segments.speaker: S1
